description:
Chapter 19:
Koto takes her mother from the Shrine`s Holy Grounds to the Looking Glass City.
Chapter 20:
The three siblings enjoy their time with their mother, but...
Chapter 21:
Koto tries to find out the secret of her birth from her mother, but instead she`s asked to save her poor father.  With no place for her feelings to go, she takes them out on Myoue.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Haha ga Kikan Shite Tsuide ni Chichi mo Kikan Shita
Maman et papa sont de retour
Mom`s Back, and oh, Dad`s Back, Too
母が帰還してついでに父も帰還した
